abstract: Kai Bird reviews book Almighty: Courage, Resistance, and Existential Peril in the Nuclear Age by Dan Zak.

headline.main: How to Keep an Atomic Bomb From Being Smuggled Into New York City? Open Every Suitcase With a Screwdriver.

keywords.value: Almighty: Courage, Resistance, and Existential Peril in the Nuclear Age (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: Dan Zak’s “Almighty” is a perfectly measured blend of biography, suspense and history....
lead_paragraph: Dan Zak’s “Almighty” is a perfectly measured blend of biography, suspense and history.
